subheader.title: An immersive exhibition at the frontiers of knowledge
subheader.description: The most incomprehensible thing about the universe is that it is comprehensible.

about.sectionTitle: In Pursuit of Light, an exhibition of Albert Einstein's work
about.paragraph: In the age of deepfakes and generative artificial intelligence, the reliability of our sensory perceptions is at risk...

faq.question: How long is the exhibition?
faq.answer: The exhibition lasts about 1 hour, but you can spend more time depending on your interest.

faq.question: Do I need to reserve in advance?
faq.answer: Yes, entry is free, but reservation is mandatory.
